thread.title: Reliance Jio has a wide range of tariffs to choose from; here are the best ones for you
thread.title_full: Reliance Jio has a wide range of tariffs to choose from; here are the best ones for you

author: tech2 News Staff
title: Reliance Jio has a wide range of tariffs to choose from; here are the best ones for you
text:
RIL Chairman Mukesh Ambani today announced the Jio Prime Membership program . Under the program, Only Jio users who subscribe at Rs 99 a year are eligible for a Rs 303 plan that offers all the benefits of the Jio New Year offer.
The Reliance Jio Happy New Year offer includes 1GB of free data usage per day, unlimited browsing at 128 kbps thereafter, unlimited voice, SMS and access to Jio apps as well as free, high-speed data access between 2AM and 5AM. This is equivalent to a 30GB per month plan.
If youâ€™re not keen on spending Rs 303 a month, Jio still has a number of excellent tariff offers for subscribers to choose from. All plans offer unlimited local and STD calls as well as unlimited roaming to any network in India.
Here are the prepaid offers: 
Rs 19 per day 
This gets you 100MB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 200MB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS.
Rs 129 per week 
This gets you 750MB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 1.5GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS.
Rs 149 for 28 days 
This gets you 300MB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 700MB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and 100 free SMS.
Rs 299 for 21 days 
This gets you 2GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 4GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS.
Rs 499 for 28 days 
This gets you 4GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 8GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS as well as a discount on ISD calls.
Rs 999 for 28 days 
This gets you 10GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 120GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS as well as a discount on ISD calls.
Rs 1,499 for 28 days 
This gets you 20GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 40GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS. You also get 30 minutes of free ISD calls and a discounted rate.

Here are the postpaid offers: 
Rs 149 per month 
This gets you 300MB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 700MB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and 100 free SMS.
Rs 499 per month 
This gets you 4GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 7AM, 8GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS as well as discounted ISD calls.
Rs 999 per month 
This gets you 10GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 20GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS as well as discounted ISD calls.
Rs 1,499 per month 
This gets you 20GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 40GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS. You also get 30 minutes of free ISD calls and a discounted rate.
Rs 2,499 per month 
This gets you 35GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 70GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS. You also get 50 minutes of free ISD calls and a discounted rate.
Rs 3,999 per month 
This gets you 60GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 120GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS. You also get 80 minutes of free ISD calls and a discounted rate.
Rs 4,999 per month 
This gets you 75GB of data, unlimited data between 2AM and 5AM, 150GB of data on a JioNet Hotspot, access to Jio apps and unlimited SMS. You also get 100 minutes of free ISD calls and a discounted rate.
Disclaimer: Reliance Jio is owned by Reliance Industries, who also own Network18, the publisher of Firstpost and tech2. 
The post Reliance Jio has a wide range of tariffs to choose from; here are the best ones for you appeared first on Tech2 .
